name: Golden Record
description:
Defend the earth in this arcade-like space shooter and compete with the highscore of other defenders.

The invitation was received.
In 1977, NASA launched the Voyager I deep space probe to explore the unknown reaches of our galaxy. Among the scientific instruments, the probe carried an audio-visual message on a solid gold disk, the GOLDEN RECORD.
That message welcomed any alien species to visit our planet and described the beauty, natural resources and exact location of Planet Earth.

We thought the aliens would be our friends…

This game can be played with keyboard or controller.
Ship Movement: Arrow Keys or WASD
Shoot Laser: blank
Launch Rocket: ALT Left
